name: MyownMetronome
0:
”Alexa, open my own metronome”
”Alexa, launch my own metronome and set one hundred BPM and beat four quarters”
”Alexa, ask my own metronome to increase speed”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my own metronome
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using a metronome has never been easier: “Alexa, start my own metronome and set one hundred BPM and beat four quarters”. You can anytime pause and resume the metronome by saying: “Alexa, pause” and “Alexa, resume”. My own metronome provides you with all the BPM’s from 30 to 300 and beats from one to four quarters. By selecting beat “one quarter”, you won’t get the special beat at the beginning of each measure. All other beat settings will provide a different beat sound at each measure. You can change the metronome’s sound by asking: “Alexa, ask my own metronome another sound”.
My own metronome remembers your last session settings, even days after! No need to set them up again, just launch the metronome with “Alexa, open up my own metronome” and it will propose your last setting. You can accept the proposed BPM and beat by saying “Yes” or change it to whatever you like, by answering “Switch”.
You can anytime increase or decrease the metronome’s BPM’s by saying: “Alexa, ask my own metronome to increase speed”, or “ “Alexa, ask my own metronome to decrease speed”.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
